title: The connection is frequently lost when connecting to the Internet via mobile data
answer:
Connect to the Internet in an area with a stronger mobile data signal.

Go to Settings, select Mobile networks (EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3) or More > Mobile networks (EMUI 3.0) and then select the Enable always-on mobile data check box.

Go to Settings and select Mobile networks > Access Point Names (EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3) or More > Mobile networks > Access Point Names (EMUI 3.0).

Check with your network provider that the access point name (APN) parameters are correct. You can view the current access points by selecting Mobile networks > Access Point Names.

If you still cannot resolve the issue after trying the steps above, you are recommended to restart your phone or restore your phone to factory settings after backing up important data.
keywords: Internet connection drops frequently, mobile data
